name: Set Layout Intent
description:
Set the UI layout intent to organize components semantically. **CRITICAL: Call this FIRST before render_manifest to establish the layout pattern.**

**When to use each intent:**
- User wants overview/dashboard → 'dashboard'
- User wants to focus/write/read → 'focus'
- User wants to compare things → 'compare'
- User wants to browse/explore → 'hero-detail'
- User asks "what happened" → 'timeline'
- User needs step-by-step guide → 'wizard'
- User wants to switch between items → 'tabs'
- User wants creative/design work → 'canvas'

intent.description:
Layout intent:
- focus: Single document/artifact (reading, editing)
- dashboard: Multi-metric overview (analytics, monitoring)
- compare: Side-by-side comparison (diff, A/B test)
- hero-detail: Master-detail pattern (list+preview, file browser)
- timeline: Chronological feed (activity log, chat history)
- spatial: Maps/canvas/geographic data
- wizard: Multi-step workflow (onboarding, checkout)
- canvas: Creative workspace (design tool, whiteboard)
- split: Multi-document parallel work
- tabs: Categorical organization (settings, profiles)
- modal-over: Interrupt workflow (confirmations, forms)
- grid-explore: Gallery/exploratory browsing

clearComponents.description: Whether to clear ephemeral components when changing intent. Default true.
